I‚Äôm still struggling to get the files sent to the right folder. I enabled the custom folder determination option and wrote the instruction as you did in the video. 

If the note contains a Receipt, send to Expenses folder

[11:07:59] 7. Moved original to: Expenses/IMG_1320
[11:07:59] 8. Moved to attachments: Vindi Auto Mercado Receipt 31-10-2024

When I check the Expenses folder there‚Äôs nothing there. And when i check the attachments folder it‚Äôs just an exact transcription word by word  of the receipt instead of applying the Receipt template instructions (i did change the template since the receipts are in Spanish so maybe that‚Äôs the reason it‚Äôs not being processed, but it should be sent to the right folder at least)

Please let me know if I‚Äôm messing up somewhere! Thank you
Got it. Will setup my phone in Spanish and make the adjustments. And I‚Äôll send you the few changes you‚Äôll need to make on your iOS shortcut later today

<@718656944499589220> in what language is your iOS? There are a couple of adjustments to make if it‚Äôs not in English. Can tell you exactly what to do if I know the language. I suspect this is why you‚Äôre having this issue

<@756183250606751794> if no templates make sense for a certain document, this message is expected. The ai would not default to any templante. And you can then manually select the one to apply

Much appreciated <@701785424921886750> currently cannot get plugin to recognize Ollama inputs being served at port 11434 or at other ports for that matter.

Another technical related question just because there's the concern about performance of locally hosted LLMs, would command-r be sufficient for quality?
Hey <@289114919465385984> happy to help you with the setup. Where are you stuck?

New to FileOrganizer2000, this discord group and Obsidian. Taken with the thought of having a notetaking and environment that is partially self-organizing for improving my workflow. With a newcomers perspective, could a self-hosting text channel for this application be created in the discord group? A comprehensive discussion board and potential support group with close ties to the curators of this application: would benefit a community using this application, draw more potential use-case from new users feeling supported, and keep visibility of Fo2k and Different AI by encouraging folks to coming to a sanctioned resource. Would imagine it would also draw some of the recurring and irrelevant questions out of other threads. Having to go between Github, Reddit, and other sources for guidance that would benefit from having a dedicated channel  That said, am encountering similar issues that self-hosting instructions are not up-to-date as the code structure seems to have changed since the Github update and Llaama 3.2. Will there be a revisitation of the instructions to correct for accuracy in the matter?
<@1126106541767016449> haven't tested myself yet but this is what's been shared with me. I thought that maybe you'll manage to set it up before I release the video if you're curious
I will record a video this week or early next week to show you how to set it up
but I hear you. thanks to your feedback we actually just made our ai chat compatible with local LLMs for a starter

<@1126106541767016449> the main reason is that it's pretty much double the work if not more to make sure a single local LLM model is even compatible with the app. Let alone ensure it gives results consistently. And then it all trickles down over time as we need to maintain compatibility for multiple models for all future updates. Local LLMs are much more stubborn to work with.

I see your point, local LLMs are not going to perform as well as commercial ones, but why not let users decide if they prefer lower quality in exchange for data privacy? Please keep easy local-only setup on your radar. I would still take a subscription for being able to protect my data.

hi <@1126106541767016449> setting up local llms is only possible via code if you self-host and are technical at the moment. The tasks Fo2k requires make current LLMs rather underperforming. We made more tests this week with llama 3.2 and concluded the results were much lower in terms of quality compared to what we'd feel comfortable to ship. So we will keep on focusing on gpt4o until local LLMs return acceptable results at least

I have just taken the monthly plan for FO2k, but I want to use a local LLM served through LM Studio or Ollama. Is this possible and where do I find instructions to set this up? (The Advanced Settings tab does not offer much help). I don't mind to keep paying for a plan, if only for support, but I want to use a local-only solution).
this has been fixed in the latest version

<@691019833839714445> <@573969491160203266> in our case, the code is open source. So you can see that we do not store or access your data if you analyze the code. We just forward it to openAI to be processed. For openAI's privacy policy, you can check their website for the details and intricacies. But as <@691019833839714445> says they claim to neither save it or use it for training their models.
They are accessible, they both claim not to save your data. You have to take their words for it.

I have it figured out.  It was the main directory name.  It had an underscore that I was missing when I renamed it.  Appears to be working now.
Just tried renaming main directory--still no luck.
Yeah, spelling is correct.  However, I have my main FO2K folder named FO2K/Fabric/patterns.  Do I need to leave the original directory naming conventions?
could you double-check the spelling? should be exactly "Fabric" and subfolder "patterns" as seen in the video
you would see that issue when the folder is not set up correctly
Having same issue as well.

Good Afternoon!  I am having this same issue myself as well trying out the Fabric update.  I have created the Fabric Folder under my FO2K folder, and downloaded/added patterns folder as shown in video.  Also, turned on enable Fabric in customization settings.
I have tested and confirm that it fixed the issue
Released a fix for that in v1.47.1. Any new logs will now have a . character add the end, which I think should solve your issue?
will get this fixed üôè
and then you'll be able to apply any of them to your notes
you can download the fabric repo here. then just copy the enclosed patterns folder into your vault
okay so I'm testing the system now and that's how it's working for me. You need to create a "Fabric" folder and place the patterns folder in there

I have a tech issue that has come up that I think may be an issue for some. There have been a few times that my navigation to my daily notes have gone to my FO2k log instead. The calendar plugin has done this, a button I put on my dashboard page, and when I put a date link in a heading. I have tried putting the FO2k log folder in my Exclude list, but this hasn‚Äôt fixed it. I would recommend the ability to append a string to the beginning of a log file (or at the end) so that daily notes does not get confused.
Very cool
yes what's new for now is an experimental feature to apply fabric AI patterns in the same way the templates AI currently work. Hoping to have time to make a demo video tomorrow

Hi guys,

Need help?

we were putting a lot of effort for officially releasing a local only version a few months back. But after a lot of testing and experimenting we concluded it was best to stick to openAI for the sake of quality. We still want to release a local llm only version down the line though, but I can't tell you when that I'll be. But that's still probably a few months away. Right now our focus is on making the best experience we can with openAI. 

But if you're technical, you'll be able to make some modifications in the code to set it up with a local llm yourself in the meantime. Happy to help you with your setup as well

it will be GPT-4o by default or whichever model you define with the env. ``MODEL_NAME``
What about chat feature? How can I  change the model for that? It isn't listed in the `.env.example` file
My vault isnt that big now so don't know how good results would be but I will let you know
Cool let me know how it goes üôè
yes it's much cheaper. We also tried it for a little while but decided to switch back to 4o. Quality was noticeable worse overall
What about gpt-4o-mini? Its cheaper
Trying llama-3.1 for now myself. Probably will be fine for most cases but sometimes could be wrong
this was before the release of llama 3.1

we tried pretty much everything we could get our hands on but we couldn't find anything that matched the consistency and quality of gpt-4o. You'll likely see more errors and odd guesses, especially for smaller local models. But maybe they have improved now
What would say is the quality of open source models compared to gpt-4o? Are they usable?
Ok, that's fine.

that's what we were using before but it was not powerful enough for where we wanted to get. But you could set it up with a bit of work. If you check our code from a couple months back you'll see how it used to be
Oh, no way to use openai-whisper then?

we recently upgraded the system for audio transcription and it now relies on an external server that uses Deepgram. So you'd have to deploy this as well. It will only work out of the box for paid users as of now
It did, its working now. Thank you.
Got it. What about the audio transcription model? How can I modify that?
hope this helps ‚úåÔ∏è
and for other models you'll have to adjust the provider variable name of course
so you'd just need to reproduce that, pretty much

<@1063219007756447805> the API key will be an environment variable named ``OPENAI_API_KEY`` and the variable for the model is ``MODEL_NAME``

We are using vercel's AI SDK so there will be no api base url to set directly. Check out the documentation here: https://sdk.vercel.ai/docs/foundations/providers-and-models

But what you will need to do is update the ``models.ts`` file in the codebase. In the screenshot you can see the models that we have currently integrated
